org.smooks.api

Interface Registry

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRegistry

    public interface Registry
    A general purpose store for holding system and user objects such as ResourceConfigs and ContentHandlers. Clients should call deRegisterObject(Object) to remove registered objects once they are no longer needed.
